name: Kitty Pride
description:
This is Gatto the cat.

Gatto has weird dreams at night.

Ok? Now we have Mai the bunny.

Mai has dreams in which Gatto who has weird dreams appears.

WTF is happening, Gatto and Mai? What is the meaning of all this?

Gatto, don't tell me we're going to be brought by a series of circumstances to meet personified fragments of your personality that come straight from your dreams and make a mess in the real world!?

Oh, nice.

And what do these fragments look like?
